channel.title: Consortium Partners on Meetween
channel.description: Recent content in Consortium Partners on Meetween

item.title: Fondazione Bruno Kessler
item.description: Fondazione Bruno Kessler (FBK) is a multidisciplinary research institution specializing in the fields of technology, innovation, the humanities and social sciences, based in Trento, Italy.

item.title: Karlsruhe Institute of Technology
item.description: The Karlsruhe Institute of Technology (KIT) is a leading research university in Europe, focusing on crucial areas such as environmental-friendly energy generation and internet security.

item.title: Template
item.description: Consortium partner description here. Anything after the first period appears only on the partner page.

item.title: Translated
item.description: Translated is a global translation and localization company headquartered in Rome, Italy.
